citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:15pm on
30-Mar-17.
The Inspector was able to make contact with the Licensee. He confirmed that no one was available for inspection
at that time.
